SEARCH
Package com.project.moviebooking.controller

Class ShowController

java.lang.Object
com.project.moviebooking.controller.ShowController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/show") public class ShowController extends Object
This is a controller class for the creation of shows. The API requests for show are declared here. The methods to create a show, get the shows using different parameters are present here.

  • Method Details

    • createShow

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> createShow(@RequestBody ShowRequest showRequest)
      This method is for the creation of show which can only be done by admins.
      Parameters:
      showRequest - Contains the information of the show that needs to be created.
      Returns:
      A created show body is returned if the theatre is created successfully along with message otherwise in the case of error only error message is returned.

    • getAllShowsByMovie

      @GetMapping @RequestMapping("/movie") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> getAllShowsByMovie(@RequestParam String movieName)
      This method is used to get the shows by movie.
      Parameters:
      movieName - This is the name of the movie of which we want all the shows.
      Returns:
      A list with all the show information is returned along with a message otherwise in the case of any error only the error message is returned.

    • getAllShowsByMovieAndCity

      @GetMapping @RequestMapping("/movie-and-city") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> getAllShowsByMovieAndCity(@RequestParam String movieName, @RequestParam String cityName)
      This method is used to get the show by the movie and respective city.
      Parameters:
      movieName - This is the name of the movie of which we want all the shows.
      cityName - This is the name of the city.
      Returns:
      A list with all the show information is returned along with a message otherwise in the case of any error only the error message is returned.
